name.ja: <ruby>天<rt>てん</rt></ruby><ruby>使<rt>し</rt></ruby>のお<ruby>注<rt>ちゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>射<rt>しゃ</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: When your opponent draws a card(s) during their turn, or when your opponent Normal Summons a monster.

effect.en: Send 1 monster from your field to the Graveyard. Then, if you have an EARTH Attribute monster with 400 ATK/1500 DEF in your Graveyard, you can destroy 1 monster on your opponent's field.
